message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $180. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down to $165. This is a very fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this deal happen!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $155 for the product.
